      • submitCoreProfile

        @RequestMapping(value="/Profile/Edit/Core",
                method=POST)
public String submitCoreProfile(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                                      @RequestParam(value="email")
                                      String email)
        Handler method for new core profile information submission.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        email - The new e-mail.
        Returns:
        Profile edit success page if the profile update succeeds. Core profile information edit page with the appropriate error otherwise.

      • submitNewPassword

        @RequestMapping(value="/Profile/Edit/Password",
                method=POST)
public String submitNewPassword(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                                      @RequestParam(value="oldPassword")
                                      String oldPassword,
                                      @RequestParam(value="password")
                                      String newPassword,
                                      @RequestParam(value="cPassword")
                                      String cNewPassword,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handler method for password submission.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        oldPassword - Current password for verification.
        newPassword - The new password.
        cNewPassword - The new password copy used for confirmation.
        request - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        Password change success page if changing the password succeeds. Change password page with the appropriate error otherwise.

      • submitPreferences

        @RequestMapping(value="/Profile/Edit/Preferences",
                method=POST)
public String submitPreferences(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                                      @RequestParam(value="hide_public_owned",required=false)
                                      Boolean hidePublicOwned)
        Handler method for new profile preferences submission.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        hidePublicOwned - The selection to hide or display one's own public files.
        Returns:
        Profile edit success page if the preferences update succeeds. Profile preferences edit page with the appropriate error otherwise.
